author: dims
msg: Fix for AXIS2-2328 - Out of memory error in Callback receiver

author: gdaniels
msg: * Fix DOOM bug in SOAPEnvelopeImpl where it would allow a SOAPHeader to come after a SOAPBody.  This was being masked by getHeader(), which used to call getFirstChildWithName() - so of course the header would show up even though it was after the body.  Once I fixed getHeader() to only check the first element, a SAAJ test started breaking because getHeader() was returning null.
* Add a test to make sure we don't regress the above.
* More work on versioning, move static QName constants up to SOAP*Constants interface, and provide a way to get MU faultcode QName from SOAPVersion.
* Make sure a null RolePlayer means doing the default search (ultimate receiver and next, but nothing else) for targeted headers.

author: markt
msg: Update host doc now directories in appBase without WEB-INF are auto-deployed.

author: doronc
msg: LUCENE-829: close done readers in contrib/benchmark.
